metadata.titleEn: A global  benchmark dataset for data-driven land surface variables prediction (1979-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 用于数据驱动陆面变量预测的全球基准数据集（1979-2020）
metadata.description: We provide a set of benchmark data LandBench1.0, used for data driven land surface variables prediction.The data set is based on ERA5 - land, ERA5, SoilGrid, the SMSC and MODIS data sets generated and provided 0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees resolution daily global data.Data preprocessing, convenient to use in a data-driven model.We also provide a benchmark data set kit, open access is available at https://github.com/2023ATAI/Landbench.This toolkit promoted the existing method to achieve, a new prediction model of development and utilization of the unified evaluation index, the kit also includes used in high resolution land surface variables predicted global address mapping technology.Benchmark data set for the purpose of computer and the earth system is to encourage cooperation between scientists, in order to develop effective land surface variables prediction based on machine learning data driven model.
metadata.descriptionCn: 我们提供了一个基准数据集LandBench1.0，用于数据驱动的陆面变量预测。该数据集基于ERA5-land、ERA5、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS等数据集生成，提供了0.5、1、2和4度分辨率的每日全球数据。数据进行了预处理，以方便在数据驱动模型中使用。我们还提供了一个基准数据集工具包，可在https://github.com/2023ATAI/Landbench上公开访问。此工具包促进了现有方法的重新实现、新预测模型的开发以及统一评估指标的使用，该工具包还包括用于高分辨率全球陆面变量预测的地址映射技术。基准数据集的目的是鼓励计算机和地球系统科学家之间的合作，以便于开发有效的基于机器学习的陆面变量预测数据驱动模型。
metadata.instructions: File name: LandBench 1.0 is stored in NetCDF (.nc) format. Data reading method: there are many freely available softwares or programming languages such as python, NCL, and Panoply for manipulating or displaying NetCDF Data.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件命名：LandBench 1.0以Net.CDF(.nc)格式存储。 数据读取方式：可用python，NCL，Panoply等软件展示或操作该NetCD格式文件。

background: Deep learning (DL), a branch of machine learning (ML) based on a set of artificial neural networks, has been widely explored to enhance the representation of the raw inputs that are significant for discrimination in many scientific disciplines. Due to the limitations in pattern recognition of high-dimensional raw data by universal approximator models in ML, DL enhances the capacity for modeling non-linear problems with multi-layered artificial neural networks. As a result, DL has been widely applied in uncovering complex relationships in many fields with large multivariate, inhomogeneous datasets. Land surface variables (LSVs), such as soil moisture, land surface temperature and latent and sensible heat fluxes, are identified as an important component of the Essential Climate Variables by the Global Observing System for Climate. The prediction of LSVs holds great significance in Earth system science as it helps to anticipate and comprehend the complexities of our real world. In the last decades, many researchers have tried to measure this issue based on process-based models such as land surface models, hydrology models and Earth system models, which utilize governing equations to capture the complex mechanisms of land–atmosphere feedbacks. Although process-based models have been successful in recent researches, they still have limitations for many practical applications, such as underrepresentation of key processes and human activities, high computational costs, a large range of predictions from different models, and low skill in predicting the extremes.
research objective: Hence, we propose a LSVs benchmark dataset and prediction toolbox to boost research in data-driven LSVs modeling and improve the consistency of data-driven deep learning models for LSVs. We hope LandBench will not only serve as a standardized framework, fostering equitable model comparisons, but also provide indispensable data and a robust scientific foundation essential for advancing climate change research, disaster management, and sustainable development initiatives.
challenges: However, few researchers focus on the benchmark datasets for LSVs predictions that hampers fair comparisons of different data-driven deep learning models.
methods: The developed benchmark dataset and evaluation metrics for predicting LSVs using data-driven approaches, named as the LandBench toolbox, were implemented using Pytorch.
dataset: LSVs benchmark dataset contains a large number of hydrology-related variables, such as global soil moisture, runoff, etc., which can verify the simulation of hydrological processes. Various global data from European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts reanalysis 5 (ERA5), ERA5-land, global gridded soil information (SoilGrid), soil moisture storage capacity (SMSC), and moderate-resolution imaging spectroradiometer (MODIS) datasets have been pre-processed into daily data at 0.5-, 1-, 2-, and 4-degree resolutions to facilitate their use in data-driven models.
findings: Among the DL models, LSTM with 365-time - step model achieved the best performance with the smallest RMSE and the largest R, followed by LSTM with 7-timestep model, Crossformer, ConvLSTM and CNN models. Furthermore, the LSTM model outperformed the other models in predicting both variables at 1- and 5-day lead time. Additionally, we noted that extending the LSTM model’s timestep from 7 to 365 enhanced its predictive performance, yielding higher R values and lower RMSE values for soil moisture at 1- and 5-day lead times, and for surface sensible heat fluxes at a 5-day lead time. The LSTM model with 365 timesteps outperformed the processed-based model, exhibiting higher R and lower RMSE for both lead times at all resolutions.
backgroundCn: 深度学习（DL）是机器学习（ML）的一个分支，基于一组人工神经网络，已被广泛探索以增强对许多科学领域中重要的原始输入的表示。由于通用逼近模型在高维原始数据的模式识别方面存在局限性，深度学习通过多层人工神经网络增强了建模非线性问题的能力。因此，深度学习已被广泛应用于揭示许多领域中大规模多变量、不均匀数据集的复杂关系。土地表面变量（LSVs），如土壤湿度、地表温度以及潜热和显热通量，被全球气候观测系统认定为基本气候变量的重要组成部分。预测土地表面变量在地球系统科学中具有重要意义，因为它有助于预测和理解我们现实世界的复杂性。在过去几十年中，许多研究人员尝试基于过程模型（如陆面模型、水文模型和地球系统模型）来测量这一问题，这些模型利用控制方程捕捉陆气反馈的复杂机制。尽管过程模型在最近的研究中取得了一定成功，但在许多实际应用中仍存在局限性，例如对关键过程和人类活动的低估、计算成本高、不同模型预测范围大以及在预测极端事件时的低技能。
research objectiveCn: 因此，我们提出了一个LSVs基准数据集和预测工具，以促进数据驱动的LSVs建模研究，并提高数据驱动深度学习模型在LSVs方面的一致性。我们希望LandBench不仅能作为一个标准化框架，促进公平的模型比较，还能提供不可或缺的数据和坚实的科学基础，这对推动气候变化研究、灾害管理和可持续发展倡议至关重要。
challengesCn: 然而，少数研究者关注用于LSVs预测的基准数据集，这妨碍了不同数据驱动深度学习模型的公平比较。
methodsCn: 开发的基准数据集和评估指标用于通过数据驱动的方法预测LSVs，命名为LandBench工具箱，使用Pytorch实现。
datasetCn: LSVs基准数据集包含大量与水文相关的变量，如全球土壤湿度、径流等，可以验证水文过程的模拟。来自欧洲中期天气预报中心再分析5（ERA5）、ERA5-land、全球网格土壤信息（SoilGrid）、土壤湿度储存能力（SMSC）和中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）数据集的各种全球数据已被预处理为0.5度、1度、2度和4度分辨率的日数据，以便于在数据驱动模型中的使用。
findingsCn: 在深度学习模型中，365时间步的LSTM模型以最小的RMSE和最大的R值取得了最佳性能，其次是7时间步的LSTM模型、Crossformer、ConvLSTM和CNN模型。此外，我们注意到，LSTM模型在1天和5天的预测中均优于其他模型。值得一提的是，将LSTM模型的时间步从7延长到365提高了其预测性能，在1天和5天的提前期内，土壤湿度的R值更高，RMSE值更低，而在5天的提前期内，表面显热通量的预测性能也得到了提升。365时间步的LSTM模型在所有分辨率下的表现优于基于过程的模型，展现出更高的R值和更低的RMSE值。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a benchmark dataset and toolbox implemented using Pytorch for predicting land surface variables?
Verification.QuestionCn: 是否有一个基准数据集和工具箱，使用Pytorch实现用于预测地表变量？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the evaluation metrics for predicting LSVs using data-driven approaches implemented using Pytorch, TensorFlow, or another framework?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 用于预测LSVs的评估指标是使用Pytorch、TensorFlow或其他框架实现的吗？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main data sources used for collecting land surface variables in data-driven models?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于在数据驱动模型中收集地表变量的主要数据来源有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges exist in creating benchmark datasets for predicting land surface variables?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 创建用于预测地表变量的基准数据集面临哪些挑战？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Few researchers focus on the benchmark datasets for LSVs predictions
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 很少有研究人员专注于用于LSVs预测的基准数据集。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of using the LandBench toolbox in land surface variable prediction?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 使用LandBench工具箱进行地表变量预测的目的是什么？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to predict land surface variables using machine learning techniques?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于预测地表变量的机器学习技术的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves preprocessing various global datasets such as ERA5, ERA5-land, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS into daily data with resolutions of 0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees to facilitate the use of data-driven models.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及对各种全球数据集进行预处理，如ERA5、ERA5-land、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，将其转化为日数据，分辨率为0.5、1、2和4度，以便于数据驱动模型的使用。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when creating benchmark datasets for land surface variable predictions?
Example.QuestionCn: 创建地表变量预测基准数据集时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge is the lack of focus on benchmark datasets for LSV predictions, which hampers fair comparisons of different data-driven deep learning models.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是缺乏针对LSV预测的基准数据集，这妨碍了不同数据驱动深度学习模型之间的公平比较。

Example.QuestionEn: Provide an example of a dataset used to verify the simulation of hydrological processes in land surface variable prediction.
Example.QuestionCn: 提供一个用于验证地表变量预测中水文过程模拟的数据集示例。
Example.AnswerEn: The LSVs benchmark dataset includes a large number of hydrology-related variables, such as global soil moisture and runoff, which are used to verify the simulation of hydrological processes.
Example.AnswerCn: LSVs基准数据集包括大量与水文相关的变量，如全球土壤湿度和径流，这些变量用于验证水文过程的模拟。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features of a dataset designed for data-driven prediction of land surface variables?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于数据驱动的地表变量预测的数据集的关键特征包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: global soil moisture, runoff, derived from multiple sources, pre-processed into daily data, resolutions of 0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全球土壤湿度、径流，来自多个来源，预处理为每日数据，分辨率为0.5、1、2和4度。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches are used in constructing datasets for enhancing deep learning models in land surface variable prediction?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在构建数据集以增强深度学习模型在地表变量预测中的应用时，使用了哪些方法论方法？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: pre-processing global data, daily data, various resolutions, data-driven approach, Pytorch, benchmark datasets, evaluation metrics
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 预处理全球数据、每日数据、各种分辨率、数据驱动方法、Pytorch、基准数据集、评估指标。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the resolution range provided by a dataset for land surface variables prediction?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于地表变量预测的数据集提供的分辨率范围是什么？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different global datasets were combined to create a dataset for land surface variables prediction?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 为了创建一个土地表面变量预测的数据集，结合了多少个不同的全球数据集？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What time range is covered by a dataset used for global land surface variables prediction?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于全球陆地表面变量预测的数据集覆盖的时间范围是什么？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by a benchmark dataset in the context of data-driven land surface variable predictions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在数据驱动的地表变量预测中，基准数据集是指用于评估和比较不同模型或算法性能的标准数据集。
Definition.AnswerEn: A benchmark dataset in the context of data-driven land surface variable predictions refers to a standardized collection of data that can be used to evaluate and compare the performance of various models in predicting land surface variables. It includes pre-processed data from multiple sources like ERA5, ERA5-land, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS, which are available at different resolutions to facilitate the use in data-driven models.
Definition.AnswerCn: 基准数据集在数据驱动的陆地表面变量预测中指的是一个标准化的数据集合，可以用来评估和比较各种模型在预测陆地表面变量方面的性能。它包括来自多个来源的预处理数据，如ERA5、ERA5-land、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，这些数据以不同的分辨率提供，以便于在数据驱动模型中使用。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does the term 'data-driven approach' refer to in the context of predicting land surface variables?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在预测地表变量的背景下，“数据驱动方法”一词指的是一种依赖于数据分析和统计模型来进行预测和决策的方式。这种方法通常利用大量的观测数据和历史记录，通过机器学习、统计分析等技术，识别出数据中的模式和关系，从而对未来的地表变量进行预测。
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of predicting land surface variables, a 'data-driven approach' refers to the methodology that relies on machine learning and deep learning techniques to model and predict variables using large datasets. This approach contrasts with process-based models by focusing on patterns and relationships within the data itself rather than predefined equations.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在预测地表变量的背景下，“数据驱动方法”指的是一种依赖于机器学习和深度学习技术，通过大型数据集来建模和预测变量的方法。这种方法与基于过程的模型形成对比，侧重于数据本身的模式和关系，而不是预定义的方程。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with using deep learning models for land surface variable predictions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用深度学习模型进行地表变量预测面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: The challenges associated with using deep learning models for land surface variable predictions include the difficulty in fairly comparing different models due to the lack of standardized benchmark datasets, and the complexities involved in accurately modeling the non-linear relationships and high-dimensional data inherent in land surface variables.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用深度学习模型进行地表变量预测所面临的挑战包括，由于缺乏标准化的基准数据集，难以公平地比较不同模型，以及准确建模地表变量固有的非线性关系和高维数据的复杂性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data pre-processing techniques for datasets from ERA5-land, ERA5, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS compare in terms of facilitating their use in data-driven models for land surface variables prediction?
Comparison.QuestionCn: ERA5-land、ERA5、SoilGrid、SMSC 和 MODIS 数据集的数据预处理技术在促进其在数据驱动模型中用于地表变量预测方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The datasets from ERA5-land, ERA5, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS are pre-processed into daily data at resolutions of 0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees to ensure their compatibility with data-driven models. This standardization in pre-processing facilitates the use of these datasets in models aimed at predicting land surface variables, enhancing the consistency and comparability of the models.
Comparison.AnswerCn: ERA5-land、ERA5、SoilGrid、SMSC 和 MODIS 的数据集经过预处理，转化为日数据，分辨率为 0.5、1、2 和 4 度，以确保它们与数据驱动模型的兼容性。这种预处理的标准化促进了这些数据集在预测地表变量的模型中的使用，提高了模型的一致性和可比性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in the challenges faced by process-based models and data-driven models in predicting land surface variables?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 过程驱动模型和数据驱动模型在预测地表变量时面临的挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Process-based models face challenges such as underrepresentation of key processes, high computational costs, and low skill in predicting extremes, whereas data-driven models encounter challenges like the lack of benchmark datasets for fair comparisons. Both models aim to predict land surface variables, but process-based models rely on governing equations, while data-driven models leverage large datasets and machine learning approaches.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 基于过程的模型面临着一些挑战，例如关键过程的代表性不足、高计算成本以及在预测极端事件时的低技能，而数据驱动模型则遇到缺乏基准数据集以进行公平比较的问题。两种模型都旨在预测地表变量，但基于过程的模型依赖于控制方程，而数据驱动模型则利用大型数据集和机器学习方法。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the performance of LSTM models in predicting land surface variables compare to that of other deep learning models like Crossformer, ConvLSTM, and CNN?
Comparison.QuestionCn: LSTM模型在预测地表变量的性能与其他深度学习模型如Crossformer、ConvLSTM和CNN相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The LSTM model, especially with a 365-time-step configuration, outperformed other deep learning models like Crossformer, ConvLSTM, and CNN in predicting land surface variables. It achieved the best performance with the smallest RMSE and the largest correlation coefficient (R), particularly in predicting variables at 1- and 5-day lead times, indicating its superior capability in modeling temporal dependencies in the data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: LSTM模型，特别是采用365时间步配置的LSTM模型，在预测地表变量方面优于其他深度学习模型，如Crossformer、ConvLSTM和CNN。它在预测1天和5天的变量时，取得了最好的性能，具有最小的均方根误差（RMSE）和最大的相关系数（R），这表明其在建模数据的时间依赖性方面具有优越的能力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of different global datasets such as ERA5, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS enhance the prediction accuracy of land surface variables?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同全球数据集的整合，如ERA5、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，可以如何提高地表变量预测的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of various global datasets like ERA5, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS facilitates the representation of complex interactions by providing diverse data inputs at different resolutions, which can improve the predictive performance of data-driven models for land surface variables by capturing more detailed hydrological and atmospheric processes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 各种全球数据集的整合，如ERA5、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，通过提供不同分辨率的多样化数据输入，促进了复杂交互的表征，这可以通过捕捉更详细的水文和大气过程来提高数据驱动模型对地表变量的预测性能。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying causes that necessitate the use of data-driven approaches for predicting land surface variables (LSVs) instead of relying solely on process-based models?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 需要使用数据驱动方法来预测地表变量（LSVs）的潜在原因是什么，而不是仅仅依赖过程模型？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Process-based models, while effective, have limitations such as underrepresentation of key processes and human activities, high computational costs, a large range of predictions from different models, and low skill in predicting extremes. These limitations drive the need for data-driven approaches that can offer more efficient and accurate predictions for LSVs.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 基于过程的模型虽然有效，但存在一些局限性，例如对关键过程和人类活动的低估、较高的计算成本、不同模型之间预测结果的广泛差异，以及在预测极端事件时的低准确性。这些局限性推动了对数据驱动方法的需求，这些方法可以提供更高效和更准确的LSV预测。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a scarcity of benchmark datasets specifically designed for land surface variable predictions, and what challenges does this scarcity present?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么专门用于地表变量预测的基准数据集稀缺，这种稀缺性带来了哪些挑战？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Few researchers focus on creating benchmark datasets for LSVs predictions, which hampers fair comparisons of different data-driven deep learning models. This scarcity presents challenges in standardizing model evaluations and advancing the field through equitable model comparisons.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 少数研究者专注于为LSV预测创建基准数据集，这妨碍了不同数据驱动深度学习模型的公平比较。这种稀缺性在标准化模型评估和通过公平的模型比较推动该领域发展方面带来了挑战。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contributed to the development and adoption of the LandBench toolbox for predicting land surface variables using data-driven methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些因素促成了LandBench工具箱的开发和采用，以利用数据驱动方法预测地表变量？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need to improve the consistency of data-driven deep learning models for LSVs and to provide a standardized framework for model comparison contributed to the development of the LandBench toolbox. It aims to foster equitable comparisons and advance research in climate change, disaster management, and sustainable development.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 提高数据驱动的深度学习模型在LSVs中的一致性，并提供一个标准化的模型比较框架的需求，促成了LandBench工具箱的开发。该工具箱旨在促进公平比较，推动气候变化、灾害管理和可持续发展领域的研究。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact on the consistency of data-driven LSV models when using a benchmark dataset for data-driven modeling?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用基准数据集进行数据驱动建模时，对数据驱动LSV模型一致性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of a benchmark dataset for data-driven LSV modeling aims to improve the consistency of data-driven deep learning models for LSVs, providing a standardized framework that fosters equitable model comparisons and supports advancing climate change research, disaster management, and sustainable development initiatives.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用基准数据集进行数据驱动的LSV建模旨在提高数据驱动深度学习模型在LSV中的一致性，提供一个标准化框架，以促进公平的模型比较，并支持气候变化研究、灾害管理和可持续发展倡议的推进。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using deep learning models like LSTM with extended timesteps on the prediction accuracy of land surface variables?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用深度学习模型如LSTM与扩展时间步长对地表变量预测准确性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using deep learning models like LSTM with extended timesteps significantly enhances predictive performance, resulting in higher R values and lower RMSE values for variables such as soil moisture and surface sensible heat fluxes, outperforming process-based models at various resolutions and lead times.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用深度学习模型如LSTM与扩展时间步长显著提高了预测性能，导致土壤湿度和地表感热通量等变量的R值更高，RMSE值更低，且在不同分辨率和预测时效下优于基于过程的模型。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended objectives of creating a benchmark dataset for data-driven land surface variable predictions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建用于数据驱动的地表变量预测的基准数据集的预期目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to boost research in data-driven land surface variable modeling, improve consistency of deep learning models for these variables, and provide a standardized framework for equitable model comparisons. This framework aims to advance climate change research, disaster management, and sustainable development initiatives.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是推动数据驱动的地表变量建模研究，提高这些变量深度学习模型的一致性，并提供一个标准化框架以实现公平的模型比较。该框架旨在推动气候变化研究、灾害管理和可持续发展倡议。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to consider various global datasets in the collection process for predicting land surface variables?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在预测地表变量的收集过程中，考虑各种全球数据集的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Considering various global datasets, such as those from ERA5, ERA5-land, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS, is crucial because it allows for the verification of hydrological processes and facilitates the use of pre-processed daily data in data-driven models. This diversity helps to capture the complexities of land-atmosphere feedbacks more accurately.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 考虑到来自ERA5、ERA5-land、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS等各种全球数据集是至关重要的，因为它允许验证水文过程，并促进在数据驱动模型中使用预处理的日常数据。这种多样性有助于更准确地捕捉陆地-大气反馈的复杂性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why focus on deep learning models for the prediction of land surface variables in the context of Earth system science?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在地球系统科学的背景下，为什么要关注深度学习模型用于地表变量的预测？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Deep learning models are focused on because they enhance the capacity for modeling nonlinear problems with multi-layered artificial neural networks, which are essential for uncovering complex relationships in large multivariate, inhomogeneous datasets. This is particularly significant for predicting land surface variables, which are vital components of the Essential Climate Variables.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 深度学习模型受到关注，因为它们增强了使用多层人工神经网络建模非线性问题的能力，这对于揭示大型多变量、不均匀数据集中的复杂关系至关重要。这对于预测地表变量尤为重要，因为这些变量是基本气候变量的重要组成部分。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the necessary preprocessing steps to prepare global datasets for data-driven land surface variable predictions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为数据驱动的地表变量预测准备全球数据集所需的预处理步骤有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Global datasets, such as those from ERA5, ERA5-land, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS, need to be pre-processed into daily data with resolutions of 0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees. This preprocessing facilitates their use in data-driven models for land surface variable predictions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 全球数据集，如ERA5、ERA5-land、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，需要预处理为日数据，分辨率为0.5、1、2和4度。这种预处理有助于在数据驱动模型中使用这些数据，以进行地表变量预测。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can one implement evaluation metrics for predicting land surface variables in a data-driven manner?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何以数据驱动的方式实现土地表面变量预测的评估指标？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Evaluation metrics for predicting land surface variables can be implemented using frameworks like Pytorch, which supports the development of a prediction toolbox. This toolbox facilitates the assessment and comparison of data-driven models' performance in predicting land surface variables.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 用于预测地表变量的评估指标可以通过像Pytorch这样的框架实现，该框架支持开发预测工具箱。这个工具箱便于评估和比较数据驱动模型在预测地表变量方面的性能。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the transformation of various global datasets into daily data at multiple resolutions for use in data-driven models?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论能够将各种全球数据集转化为多分辨率的日常数据，以便用于数据驱动模型？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve pre-processing various global datasets such as ERA5, ERA5-land, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS into daily data at 0.5-, 1-, 2-, and 4-degree resolutions to facilitate their use in data-driven models.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及对各种全球数据集进行预处理，如ERA5、ERA5-land、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，将其转换为0.5度、1度、2度和4度分辨率的日数据，以便于在数据驱动模型中的使用。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges need to be addressed to enable fair comparisons between different data-driven deep learning models for land surface variable predictions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了实现不同数据驱动深度学习模型在地表变量预测中的公平比较，需要解决哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: One challenge is the lack of focus on benchmark datasets for land surface variable predictions, which hampers fair comparisons of different data-driven deep learning models.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是缺乏针对地表变量预测的基准数据集，这妨碍了不同数据驱动深度学习模型的公平比较。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges in developing benchmark datasets for land surface variable predictions using data-driven approaches?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用数据驱动方法进行地表变量预测时，开发基准数据集的预期挑战是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Few researchers focus on benchmark datasets for LSVs predictions, which hampers fair comparisons of different data-driven deep learning models. This lack of focus presents challenges in standardizing evaluations and fostering equitable model comparisons.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 少数研究者专注于LSVs预测的基准数据集，这妨碍了不同数据驱动深度学习模型的公平比较。这种缺乏关注导致了标准化评估和促进公平模型比较的挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might existing process-based models struggle to accurately predict extreme land surface variables despite their previous successes?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 现有的基于过程的模型可能会因为以下原因而难以准确预测极端地表变量，尽管它们之前取得了成功。
Expectation.AnswerEn: Process-based models have limitations for many practical applications due to underrepresentation of key processes and human activities, high computational costs, a large range of predictions from different models, and low skill in predicting extremes, which affects their accuracy in extreme conditions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 基于过程的模型在许多实际应用中存在局限性，主要由于关键过程和人类活动的代表性不足、计算成本高、不同模型的预测范围大以及在极端条件下预测极端事件的能力较低，这影响了它们在极端条件下的准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is there a need for a standardized framework for data-driven land surface variable modeling, and what are the anticipated outcomes of such an initiative?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么需要一个标准化的数据驱动地表变量建模框架，以及这样的倡议预期会带来什么结果？
Expectation.AnswerEn: A standardized framework is needed to boost research in data-driven LSVs modeling and improve the consistency of data-driven deep learning models. The anticipated outcomes include fostering equitable model comparisons and providing a robust scientific foundation for advancing climate change research, disaster management, and sustainable development initiatives.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 需要一个标准化框架来推动数据驱动的LSV建模研究，并提高数据驱动深度学习模型的一致性。预期成果包括促进公平的模型比较，并为推动气候变化研究、灾害管理和可持续发展倡议提供坚实的科学基础。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of employing deep learning models for predicting land surface variables compared to process-based models?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用深度学习模型预测地表变量的有效性，与基于过程的模型相比？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Deep learning models, particularly LSTM, have shown superior performance in predicting land surface variables with higher R values and lower RMSE compared to process-based models. This suggests that DL models are effective in capturing complex relationships and nonlinear patterns that process-based models may struggle with.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 深度学习模型，特别是长短期记忆网络（LSTM），在预测地表变量方面表现优越，具有更高的R值和更低的均方根误差（RMSE），相比于基于过程的模型。这表明深度学习模型在捕捉复杂关系和非线性模式方面非常有效，而基于过程的模型可能会遇到困难。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the implications of using pre-processed, daily resolution datasets on the consistency and comparability of data-driven land surface variable models?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，使用预处理的日分辨率数据集对数据驱动的陆地表面变量模型的一致性和可比性有何影响？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using pre-processed datasets at various resolutions (0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees) enhances the consistency and comparability of data-driven models by standardizing input data and facilitating fair comparisons. This approach helps in creating a robust foundation for developing and evaluating different models.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用不同分辨率（0.5、1、2 和 4 度）的预处理数据集可以增强数据驱动模型的一致性和可比性，通过标准化输入数据并促进公平比较。这种方法有助于为开发和评估不同模型建立坚实的基础。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the methods used to pre-process global datasets to facilitate their use in data-driven models for land surface variable prediction.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对用于预处理全球数据集以便在数据驱动模型中预测地表变量的方法感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Global datasets such as those from ERA5, ERA5-land, SoilGrid, SMSC, and MODIS are pre-processed into daily data at various resolutions (0.5, 1, 2, and 4 degrees) to make them more suitable for integration into data-driven models. This pre-processing is essential to ensure consistency, manageability, and compatibility with machine learning algorithms, allowing for effective modeling and prediction of land surface variables.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 全球数据集，如ERA5、ERA5-land、SoilGrid、SMSC和MODIS，经过预处理成每日数据，分辨率为0.5、1、2和4度，以使其更适合集成到数据驱动模型中。这种预处理对于确保一致性、可管理性和与机器学习算法的兼容性至关重要，从而允许有效建模和预测地表变量。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the challenges faced in ensuring fair comparisons of data-driven deep learning models for predicting land surface variables and suggest methods to address these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在确保对数据驱动的深度学习模型进行公平比较以预测地表变量时所面临的挑战，并提出解决这些挑战的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Few researchers focus on benchmark datasets for land surface variables predictions, which hampers fair comparisons of different data-driven deep learning models. The developed benchmark dataset and evaluation metrics for predicting land surface variables using data-driven approaches aim to address this challenge by providing a standardized framework for model comparisons.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 少数研究者专注于地表变量预测的基准数据集，这妨碍了不同数据驱动深度学习模型的公平比较。开发的基准数据集和评估指标旨在通过提供一个标准化的模型比较框架来解决这一挑战。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate and summarize the data collection methods used for creating a dataset containing hydrology-related variables globally, and explain how these methods facilitate the use of data-driven models.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查并总结用于创建包含全球水文学相关变量的数据集的数据收集方法，并解释这些方法如何促进数据驱动模型的使用。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection methods involve using various global datasets from European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts reanalysis 5 (ERA5), ERA5-land, global gridded soil information (SoilGrid), soil moisture storage capacity (SMSC), and moderate-resolution imaging spectroradiometer (MODIS). These datasets have been pre-processed into daily data at 0.5-, 1-, 2-, and 4-degree resolutions to facilitate their use in data-driven models.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用来自欧洲中期天气预报中心再分析5（ERA5）、ERA5-land、全球网格土壤信息（SoilGrid）、土壤湿度储存能力（SMSC）和中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）的各种全球数据集。这些数据集已被预处理为0.5度、1度、2度和4度分辨率的每日数据，以便于在数据驱动模型中的使用。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please examine the effectiveness of different deep learning models in predicting land surface variables and discuss the features that contribute to their performance.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请检查不同深度学习模型在预测地表变量方面的有效性，并讨论对其性能贡献的特征。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Among the deep learning models, LSTM with a 365-time-step model achieved the best performance with the smallest RMSE and the largest R, followed by LSTM with a 7-timestep model, Crossformer, ConvLSTM, and CNN models. Extending the LSTM model’s timestep from 7 to 365 enhanced its predictive performance, yielding higher R values and lower RMSE values for soil moisture at 1- and 5-day lead times, and for surface sensible heat fluxes at a 5-day lead time. The LSTM model with 365 timesteps outperformed the process-based model, exhibiting higher R and lower RMSE for both lead times at all resolutions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在深度学习模型中，具有365个时间步的LSTM模型以最小的RMSE和最大的R值实现了最佳性能，其次是具有7个时间步的LSTM模型、Crossformer、ConvLSTM和CNN模型。将LSTM模型的时间步从7扩展到365提高了其预测性能，在1天和5天的预测期内，土壤湿度的R值更高，RMSE值更低；在5天的预测期内，表面显热通量的预测性能也得到了提升。具有365个时间步的LSTM模型的表现优于基于过程的模型，在所有分辨率下的两个预测期内均表现出更高的R值和更低的RMSE值。
